page.title: 17HOME LIFE
page.content: {The Bathroom}is usually quite a small room, containing a fibre_glass or now not so commonly,a cast iron bath,and a ceramic toilet and wash basin.Attatched to the wall will probably be a towel rail,and perhaps a small shelf or two,upon which to keep toothbrushes, toothpaste,bottles of shampoo and aftershave.Also hanging from the wall will be a mirror. Frequently to be found in the bathroom is a medicine cabinet,usually on the wall,for medicines,antiseptic creams and lotions,and First Aid equipment.Because the bathroom has a damp atmosphere, the walls are often covered with emulsion paint,or vinyl covered wall paper that can be wiped dry easily. There are usually a couple of rows of ceramic tiles around the bath and wash basin.
